name: cremini coffee
description: Plain black coffee, made creamy and nutty through the addition of alien fruits. It's... probably healthy.

name: marloss mocha
description: The best way for a local guide to start off their morning.

name: portobello pie
description: A sweet, filling pie baked with unorthodox filling. Palatable to mushrooms.

name: porcini pizza
description: All the savory flavors of classic Friday-night pizza, now adaptable to alien hiveminds everywhere!

name: shiitake soup
description: Fungal fruits, diced and mixed with other ingredients to make a nutritious, tasty soup. For mushrooms.

name: enoki eggs
description: Scrambled eggs with alien plants sprinkled on top for seasoning. This probably isn't edible unless you're an alien...

//: Half as bulky and almost four times as light as normal mycus fruits; these are the kind of things you bring into labs!
name: mycus rations
description: Mycus fruits whose moisture has been drained. These dehydrated flakes lack the nutrition of their ingredient fruits, but are lighter and easier to carry in bulk.
